text: Dee Dee Ramone (born Douglas Glenn Colvin; September 18, 1952 â€“ June 5, 2002) was a German-American singer, songwriter and musician. He was best known for being a founding member of the Ramones. He was mostly a punk rock singer, but he also made some hip hop music. Ramone was born in Fort Lee, Virginia. He died from a heroin overdose, aged 49. == References == Category:Musicians from Virginia Category:1951 births Category:2002 deaths
title: Dee Dee Ramone
